message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, I'd like to propose $95 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I think $105 is still a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table.
